name: Finaux/Gentoo 1.8, A Free As in Freedom 4chan CSS.
description:
Have questions, comments, suggestions? Email me at finaux@gmx.com!

I've been working on another 4chan CSS, which means this won't get updated often, or ever, I haven't decided yet. Check it out here!

http://userstyles.org/styles/91962/gnu-finaux-v1-0-a-new-kind-of-4chan-css?r=1376755233


*LOOK OVER HERE* 
*MAKE SURE TO CHANGE YOUR THEME TO 'TOMORROW' BEFORE INSTALLING THIS CSS.*

My SECOND stab at a custom CSS for 4chan.org. Feel free to add anything, and let me know if you make any improvements, so I can update it in later versions. Modify any way you see fit. Built off of Midnight Caek, please check him out too!
additional_info:
New Features in 1.8!
-Post Number for individual threads displayed on post, neato!
-New boxing around posts!

New Features in 1.7!
-Fixed Gentoo logo disappearing!
-Added board Title Back!
-Minor Fixes!
-Please let me know of any bugs and problems!


Totally Rad Features! 
-Custom Posting Animation! 
-Removal of annoying ads!
-Be the envy of /b/tards 
  in desktop threads! 
-Rounded edges for Images! 
-/g/ approved gentoo logo! 
-Nifty little improvements!

Any and all changes are welcomed, this is completely open source. 

-Want to change the Gentoo logo to something more personal? 
Click on the Stylish logo, select 'edit' under Finaux/Gentoo 
Head to the bottom of the CSS, and change the 'imgur' link to your own shortened url. Play around with it and enjoy! 
Here's a daft punk helmet render that goes better with the color theme! Just follow the instructions above.(http://i.imgur.com/GtfNWkJ.png)

v1.7 of Finaux/Gentoo CSS for 4chan. 

Contact me and djfinaux@gmail.com for any questions or suggestions, I always need help! 

Thanks!
